title: Simone Rocha‚Äôs London Fashion Week Casting Was Perfect
text:
Model Jan de Villeneuve Photo: Catwalking/Getty Images Simone Rocha‚Äôs London Fashion Week 2017 show was the anti-ageist antidote to more typical catwalk casting. The show featured models like included iconic septuagenarians Benedetta Barzini and Jan de Villeneuve, ‚Äò90s supermodel Marie-Sophie Wilson-Carr, as well as Audrey Marnay, Adwoa Aboah, and Jamie Bochert.
Rocha‚Äôs romantic, sometimes serious sensibility was a perfect fit for the all-ages group, with feminine clothes that don‚Äôt seem frivolous. The show took place at the gorgeous Lancaster house, as seen in Downton Abbey and The Crown . Check out a few shots below.
Simone Rocha Fall 2017 casting üòç Photo by @StephWilsonShoots for @Wmag @SimoneRocha_ @PG_dMcasting @Samuel_Ellis
A post shared by B I E L P A R K L E E (@bielparklee) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:17pm PST
"Proving that true style is timeless, #SimoneRocha sent strong women of all ages down the #AW17 catwalk, including 73 year old model Bernadetta Barzino, in her signature gothic florals" - Philippa Holden, #Selfridges designerwear buyer #SelfridgesDoesFashionWeek
A post shared by Selfridges (@theofficialselfridges) on Feb 19, 2017 at 1:03am PST
@simonerocha_ @micarganaraz @adwoaaboah @jamiebochert #benedettabarzini #mariesophiewilson pics by @samuel_ellis #dmcasting
